content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors related to insufficient resources for crafting
- Ensure you have the necessary ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. Check your inventory regularly to confirm resource availability.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities in the intended placement area.
